metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20863 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: In spring framework versions prior to 5.2.24 release+ ,5.3.27+ and 6.0.8+ , it is possible for a user to provide a specially crafted SpEL expression that may cause a denial-of-service (DoS) condition.

criterions.comment: libspring-java: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
